title: Braum in TFT with Thornmail & Warmogs is fucking hilarious.
body:
Literally cannot die, does 3k damage per round while being tier 2 with knight bonus.

Im just gonna spam this until it gets hotfixed.

replies.body: Having fun playing against sorcerer team with w/ Morello.

I did this a few games ago with a 2star Braum, double thornmail (it stacks from what I saw) and a warmogs. It’s so much fun but I felt like such an evil person that whole game. He also did more damage than my carries from that point lol
If he is the prevalent in your games focus on making a moerlos or red buff. It's not hard to get 1-2 of them and will just shut him down.
